item.title: Test Single Sign-On
item.description: Test Single Sign-On Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: Existing doc: changes are needed to update the doc and to fit the new IA Target personas: Internal application builders, Saas Builder Description: Describes how to test whether SSO is working for your app integration. Current source page is dimensioned by OIDC and SAML. Need to check if this still necessary for this section fo it.
